Header: President instructs to immediately gazette amendments related to the Excise Act
Content: President Maithripala Sirisena has called on the related sectors to immediately gazette the related amendment for the Excise Act. The President issued these instructions during a meeting held at the Presidentâ€™s Office today to crackdown on narcotics and minimize crimes. The President emphasized on the occasion the need to strengthen and immediately carry forward the programme to build a country free from drugs enforcing strictly the laws related to crimes on narcotics. The progress of the programme launched to minimize crimes was reviewed. Attention was drawn to programme mooted for the rehabilitation of drug addicts.
